name: Project;Ghost Kickstarter Launch
description:
Dive into a new experience of dystopic Cyberpunk with Project;Ghost !

The story is focused on two protagonist, Ghost, and his associate/partner.
You play as Ghost, an artificial intelligence that came to have a body built for it.
Body which is yet to achieve, retrieving missing Dataships and Components.
No one knows who created Ghost in the first place, but its enhancments allows it to have some control over time, amongst many other abilities.
Having its very own personnality, and being new born, discover a realistic relationship between A.I and Human.

As Ghost will learn to master its body and abilities, exploring the world it lives in, so will you !

Project;Ghost is a fast-paced solo game, the three main branchs of gameplay are Platformer, Boss Battle, and Puzzle.

Project;Ghost is a game/prototype created by a SINGLE PERSON in two weeks, and is my first prototype.
A young 3D artist and game/level designer based in Montpellier (France).
My Artstation ; https://www.artstation.com/yirashin
Where you can see the evolution of the project since its creation, and its updates so far.
It's been made using modular assets and characters from the epic market.
Lots of features are yet to come if this game happens to be.
This is the Prototype Version/Beta.

Currently 4 playable levels ;
-Tuto
-Normal Level
-Boss Level
-Special Level
Which probably will not be in the final product. (or if they are, will be massively improved and adapted to new mechanics.)

In order to make this game concept a concrete thing, I will need your help.

How to help ? ---> Through the kickstarter I will be able to hire a small crew in order to help me make the game concrete. This game wont exist without your contribution.

-> Through feedbacks you help me improve the game.
I am eager to get yours.
